document_data.name: Diomira Trellis
document_data.mainbody:
'''Diomira Trellis''' was an Untaken of [[Umberlee]], a low-ranking member of the Bitch Queen's [[Church of Umberlee|clergy]] under Flood Tide [[Allandra Grey]] of the [[Water Queen's House]] in [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Oh Wavemother, Queen of the Depths - hear me. Please carry Holli to her final rest in the Deep Wilds.''|Untaken Diomira Trellis}}
document_data.Description: Diomira was a [[human]] woman with long straight black hair. She had heterochromia â€“ Diomira's left eye was bright aquamarine, and her right eye was black in color.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Untaken Diomira Trellis was among the low-ranking members of the who were not allowed to perform the ceremonies and sing hymns in praise of the Bitch Queen. She quietly prayed at the temple whilst Flood Tide Allandra Grey and other priestesses sang and performed a fellow priestess's [[Holli Dylford]]'s last rites. The recently perished priestess died while swimming in Baldur's Gate's [[Gray Harbor]].
